content: bocados spanish for little bites celebrate the fun of colorwork knitting - by coming in 25g skeins of alegria grande they re perfect for adding a splash of color to projects when your heart says spring but the thermometer says ugh turn to these cute little mitts they knit up quickly with 3 alegria grande bocados with frequent color changes to keep you entertained when they re done you ll have warm hands and a cheerful reminder of warmer days ahead -------------- size women s medium 7½ circumference when stretched materials manos del uruguay alegria grande bocados 75% superwash merino wool 25% polyamide approx 25g / 49 yds 1 each of colors a b and c shown in agb2419 oceano a agb2363 tahiti b and agb2020 spirulina c us 6 / 4 mm dpn or size to obtain gauge us 4 / 3 5 mm dpn 2 ring markers stitch holder tapestry needle gauge 24 sts and 28 rounds = 4 in stockinette st knit all sts every round
